biography:
Abby Dalton (born Gladys Marlene Wasden; August 15, 1932 – November 23, 2020) was an American actress, known for her television roles on the sitcoms Hennesey (1959–1962) and The Joey Bishop Show (1962–1965), and the primetime soap opera Falcon Crest (1981–1986).

name: Abby Dalton
